moves.name: Rock Slide
moves.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target Flinches.

moves.name: Head Smash
moves.effect: The user takes recoil damage equal to half of the damage it deals.

moves.name: Ancient Power
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, all of the user's stats are raised by 1.

moves.name: Stealth Rock
moves.effect: Lays a hazard on the opponent's side of the field. Pok√©mon that switch in take Rock-type damage based on their weakness to Rock.

moves.name: Rock Polish
moves.effect: The user raises its Dexterity by 2 for the rest of the scene.

moves.name: Sandstorm
moves.effect: Changes the weather to a Sandstorm for 5 rounds. All non-Rock, Ground, or Steel-types take damage at the end of each round. The Insight of Rock-types is boosted.

moves.name: Diamond Storm
moves.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the user's Vitality is raised by 2.
